quote: So he took all of these and cut them in two and put each part opposite the other, but he did not cut up the birds.

The boundary went around from Baʹal·ah westward to Mount Seʹir and passed over to the slope of Mount Jeʹa·rim at the north, that is, Chesʹa·lon, and it went down to Beth-sheʹmesh and passed over to Timʹnah.
from the descendants of Uzʹzi·el, Am·minʹa·dab the chief and 112 of his brothers.
